definition: surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: The two best-known gene culprits weren't causing her dystonia.
sentences.chinese: 两个最知名的基因元凶并非导致她肌张力障碍。

sentences.english: JiangYu know all the culprit is the father CuiZhong tragedy of pain unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 江宇晓得一切悲剧的元凶是父亲崔钟达后痛苦不已。

sentences.english: Insecurity and lack of self-confidence lead to stage fright and performance anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏安全感和自信是导致怯场和紧张的元凶。

sentences.english: Determined to make her neighborhood safe, she confronted the ringleaders .
sentences.chinese: 为了居住小区的安全，她决定勇敢的面对元凶。

sentences.english: Waist fat can also be a contributory factor in diabetes and heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 腰部脂肪是引发糖尿病或心脏病的元凶之一。

sentences.english: Fire and water are good servants but bad masters.
sentences.chinese: 水火是忠仆，造灾成元凶。

sentences.english: Cell phone elbow is also known as "cellbow" or its official name, cubital tunnel syndrome (CuTS).
sentences.chinese: 手机是肘管综合征的元凶么？

sentences.english: Many scientists have confirmed acidic blood environment is the main cause of degenerative diseases.
sentences.chinese: 很多科学家证明了酸性体质是衰竭性疾病的元凶。

sentences.english: Some demonstrators have accused government forces of being behind the violence.
sentences.chinese: 一些示威者指控政府军队时暴力行动的幕后元凶。

sentences.english: Cigarette smoking is a major cause of esophageal cancer in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，吸烟是食管癌的主要元凶。

sentences.english: Are cell phones to blame for cubital tunnel syndrome?
sentences.chinese: 手机是肘管综合征的元凶么？

sentences.english: This ever-changing balance is what ultimately determines Earth's climate.
sentences.chinese: 这个平衡被打破也是地球气候变化的元凶。

sentences.english: On the other hand, Luo Xiuxian did not execute instructions to escape the culprit.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，罗秀贤没有执行元凶的指示而私自出逃。

sentences.english: The mixture of pollutants responsible includes very fine particles and photochemical gases.
sentences.chinese: 能见度下降的元凶包括超细微粒及光化烟雾。

sentences.english: Oxidized cholesterol may be responsible for furring up the arteries.
sentences.chinese: 氧化胆固醇可能是造成动脉堵塞的元凶。

sentences.english: It wasn’t just Camilla who wrecked the marriage of Charles and Di.
sentences.chinese: 所以卡米拉并非查尔斯与戴安娜婚姻破碎的唯一元凶。

definition: criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
criminal ringleader/chief culprit/fig. cause of a problem
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
lit. the first person to bury funerary dolls (idiom)/fig. the originator of an evil practice
root of the trouble/cause of the ruin
to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
the truth about sth/the actual facts
